title: Business Analyst
content:
Who We Are
In 2021, Poatek was acquired by WillowTree, an award-winning digital product consultancy recognized as one of the fastest growing and best places to work in the United States. Now a TELUS International company, with offices across the globe, we continue to partner with the world’s leading brands, such as Capital One, HBO, PepsiCo, Domino’s and more, to design, build, and transform their digital products and strategies. We’re looking to grow our Poatek offices in Brazil with top talent excited to collaborate with team members across the globe to deliver innovative solutions for our clients.
The Opportunity
As a Business Analyst, you’ll play a central role in defining and delivering world-class products internally to WillowTree. The Business Analyst will be a vital link between our information technology capacity and our business objectives by supporting and ensuring the successful completion of analytical, business intelligence, internal tooling, testing, and deploying tasks within our Internal Tooling team. You’ll follow products through implementation, managing requirements, and working with development teams and internal stakeholders to keep development aligned with product goals.
Responsibilities

Create, guide, and facilitate the request intake process. Work closely with partners to assess scope an MVP. Partner with the Internal Tooling team to assess effort, complexity, and gaps. Create a submission package/presentation for requests to our Operations Committee for prioritization.  
Help internal stakeholders define product vision and user objectives, maintaining strong client relationships
Work with internal and external team members to define feature lists that align with business needs.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to iteratively build solutions that are in line with timeline and constraints
Facilitate conversations around scope management and feature prioritization
Elicit requirements from stakeholders and manage complex requirement backlogs that consider multiple platforms
Build a shared understanding of product requirements among all stakeholders
Understand and advocate for the end-user’s needs
Work alongside engineers to understand system architecture and data flows to guide feature development
Define configuration specifications and business analysis requirements
Perform quality assurance
Define reporting and alerting requirements
Help design, document, and maintain system processes
Report on common sources of technical issues or questions and make recommendations to product team
Communicate key insights and findings to product team
Constantly be on the lookout for ways to improve monitoring, discover issues, and deliver better value to the customer

Qualifications / Skills

Previous experience in Business / Systems Analysis or Quality Assurance
Proven experience in eliciting requirements and testing
Experience in analyzing data to draw business-relevant conclusions and in data visualization techniques and tools
An understanding of the software development life-cycle (SDLC) and experience working with Agile 
Experience working closely with stakeholders to elicit and define requirements 
Strong documentation and technical writing skills. Familiarity working with user stories, acceptance criteria, use cases, flow diagrams, user personas, and API documentation
Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and decision-making skills
Ability to size solutions based on project constraints, i.e., time/scope/budget
Experience identifying and mitigating risks that could affect project outcomes
Ability to communicate clearly, confidently, and tactfully and to simplify technical concepts for non-technical audiences
Knowledge of frontend and backend technologies (i.e., web/native apps, APIs, databases) and the risks and constraints of different technologies
An understanding of and deep appreciation for Analytics/Business Intelligence and the vital role this plays in improving systems and costs
Self-starter who takes initiative in solving problems and can self-manage commitments and deadlines

Bonus Points

Experience in writing SQL queries
Working knowledge of visualization tools
In-depth software development knowledge
Working knowledge of backend systems such as databases and cloud platforms
Certified ScrumMaster and/or Certified Scrum Product Owner

Why Poatek?
What We Offer:

Be part of an innovative consultancy with a human-centered and culture with opportunities for ownership and professional growth
Competitive salary and benefits package (annual bonus)
Opportunity to work on innovative agile projects with other high-performing, passionate team members from all over the globe
Collaborative work environment that encourages continuous learning and professional development (including English classes and support in national and international courses)
Flexible work hours and autonomy
Voucher for health activities, food allowance, in-office snacks, drinks, and games

If you love IT as much as we do, we look forward to meeting you!

Equality is a principle here at Poatek. We are committed to building an inclusive team that represents a variety of backgrounds, perspectives, beliefs, and experiences. Therefore we provide equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants regardless of race, color, religion, gender identity, sexual orientation, national origin, age, or disability.
 
We will only use the information you provide to process your application and to produce tracking statistics. Since we do not request personal data deemed sensitive, we ask you to abstain from sharing those information with us.
For more information on how we use your information, see our Privacy Policy.
